t: Monster cereals - Wikipedia
s: 3 weeks ago - The monster cereals are a line of breakfast cereals produced by General Mills in North America. Since the line was introduced in 1971, it has been associated with three enduring brands: Count Chocula, Franken Berry, and Boo Berry. The brands Frute Brute (originally Fruit Brute) and Yummy Mummy ...

t: The history of our Monsters - General Mills
s: In 1979, we surprised fans of the cereals with three monster-themed records (flexi discs). One of the records was titled “Monster Adventures in Outer Space.” · You can hear part of it in this clip. These records also included “The Monsters Go Disco” and “Count Chocula Goes to Hollywood.” · For the 30th anniversary of that promotion, Manny Galán and Pat Giles, two creatives who had a chance to leave their mark on the legacy of the Monsters brand...

t: Monster cereals | Halloween Wiki | Fandom
s: March 10, 2025 - The Monster Cereals are a line of breakfast cereals by General Mills, with each one being based off a different monster, specifically the classic Universal monsters. These seasonal cereals have been around for decades, though there were five at one point, there are now just three cereals, each ...

t: Halloween Cereal: 5 Monster Cereals, Ranked in a Taste Test | Sporked
s: March 20, 2025 - We tasted 5 General Mills monster cereals: Boo Berry, Franken Berry, Carmella Creeper, Count Chocula, and the new monster cereal, Monsters’ Frightful Friends. And then we ranked them! Find out which monster cereal is the best Halloween cereal to buy this year.
